Talents.Name: Replenishing Mist
Talents.Description: Normal heals additionally restores HP and Elemental Damage per second equal to 10% of the original amount, lasting for 6 seconds (stacks up to 3 times)

Talents.Name: Volcanic Ash Remedy
Talents.Description: Increases the Max HP of friendly units within range by +6%, and reduces the Elemental Damage they take by 12%
